# Structure of Scottish agriculture

## Introduction

Provides Scotland totals from the published results of the annual June Scottish Agricultural Census.

## Land use

Chart content.

## Agricultural area

Chart content. Total agricultural land area by nation. Percentage of LFA/non-LFA by nation

## Farm types

Chart content. Number of holdings by farm type. Area of agricultural land by farm type

## Labour

Chart content. Number of agricultural workforce by employment type. Percentage of workforce employed in agriculture
